=================
- refactor code to keep indentation and added mimetype_registry in conf template

0.0.5 (2011-02-21)
==================
- Remove not used properties from cloudooo.conf.in
- Added properties to be possible configure PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH to run cloudooo

0.0.4 (2011-01-25)
==================
- cloudoooctl: shutdown cloudooo instance properly
